title: Seattle City Council Finance & Housing Committee 8/3/21
description:
In-person attendance is currently prohibited per Washington State Governor's Proclamation 20-28.15., until the COVID-19 State of Emergency is terminated or Proclamation 20-28 is rescinded by the Governor or State legislature. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and online by the Seattle Channel.

Agenda: Call to Order, Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; Response Letter to Domestic Workers Standards Board Recommendations; CB 120131: amending 2021 Budget; CB 120150: related to the City's response to the COVID-19 crisis; CB 120147: relating to the financing of the General Fund; CB 120111: acceptance of funding from non-City sources; CB 120112: amending 2021 Budget; Multifamily Tax Exemption (MFTE) Annual Report.
Advance to a specific part
Public Comment - 3:20
Response Letter to Domestic Workers Standards Board Recommendations - 43:15
CB 120131: amending 2021 Budget - 1:01:09
CB 120150: related to the City's response to the COVID-19 crisis - 1:25:26
CB 120147: relating to the financing of the General Fund - 2:02:48
CB 120111: acceptance of funding from non-City sources and CB 120112: amending 2021 Budget - 2:21:05
